isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL HOOD TILT ASSIST SPRING ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: INSTALL HOOD TILT ASSIST SPRING ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Carefully tilt the hood to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist spring assemblies, then attach the tilt assist spring assemblies to the mounting brackets on top of the radiator as follows.
Refer to Figure 8 for all items in parentheses.

step2.para: Position tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 3) at the tilt assist spring bracket (Item 4) on top of the radiator (Item 6), passenger side shown.
Install retaining pin (Item 2) through the tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 3) and tilt assist spring bracket (Item 4), passenger side shown.

Install cotter pin and flat washer (Item 1) securing the retaining pin (Item 2) that holds the tilt assist spring assembly clevis (Item 3) to the tilt assist spring bracket (Item 4) on top of the radiator (Item 6), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install the driver side tilt assist spring assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Carefully tilt the hood to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist spring assemblies, then attach the tilt assist spring assemblies to the mounting brackets on top of the radiator as follows.
Refer to Figure 9 for all items in parentheses.

step2.para: Position tilt assist spring assembly and hood safety cable and spring assembly clevis (Item 4) of the tilt assist spring assembly (Item 7) and hood safety cable and spring assembly (Item 8) at the tilt assist spring bracket (Item 5) on top of the radiator (Item 6), driver side shown.
Install retaining pin (Item 3) through tilt assist spring assembly and hood safety cable and spring assembly clevis (Item 4) and tilt assist spring bracket (Item 5), driver side shown.

Install flat washer (Item 2), if so equipped, on retaining pin (Item 3) and install cotter pin (Item 1) securing the tilt assist spring assembly (Item 7) and hood safety cable and spring assembly (Item 8) to the tilt assist spring bracket (Item 5) on top of the radiator (Item 6), driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to install passenger side tilt assist spring assembly.

step1.para: Close the hood and latch the hood on both sides.
